headline: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) Surges 12% Following 2024 Profitability Forecast With US$1,125 Million Net Income
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) experienced a significant share price movement with a 12% increase last week, coinciding with several impactful developments at the company. Key among these was the announcement of a return to profitability for 2024, with a net income of $1,125 million compared to a net loss the previous year. The company's ongoing share buyback program also remained in focus, involving a substantial repurchase of shares accounting for 12% of the total shares outstanding, highlighting...
